text: Javier was an outstanding bartender! He was engaging and made everyone feel welcome, and his drinks were top-notch. You can tell he takes pride in his craft as every cocktail was perfectly balanced and full of flavour. Highly recommend asking for Javier if you want great drinks and vibes!

Fun speakeasy sort of place with a great musical themed vibe. All the cocktails we ordered were fabulous. I loved my old fashioned, but the negroni and Manhattan were also special. Great service to boot! Highly recommend!

Great speakeasy! Traditionally hidden entrance and style. Yogi was the bartender and he provided wonderful service. He was attentive, welcoming, and skilled. I had a great experience at 60 ml. Thank you to Yogi and the staff. I will see you next time!

Such a cool bar !!! Yogi was amazing, he was super welcoming and skilled. The cocktails Yogi made for us where really impressive, aesthetically and taste wise.

I am definitely adding 60ml in my list of the best bars of Singapore.

Yoge the bartender was wonderful. He made me a fantastic dirty martini then a creative cocktail based on my preference. He made sure I was taken care of. I am a solo traveler and so glad that I have found this bar. Great vibes, drinks, music and company!
